shortdesc.ph: Sets the allowlist for audio stream subscription.
Sets the allowlist for audio stream subscription.

p.codeblock: virtual int setSubscribeAudioAllowlistEx(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int setSubscribeAudioAllowlistEx(int[] uidList, RtcConnection connection);

ul.li: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The allowlist is not affected by , , or the autoSubscribeAudio setting in .
Once the subscription allowlist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the current channel.
If a user is added to both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The allowlist is not affected by , , or the autoSubscribeAudio setting in .
Once the allowlist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is added to both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: This method applies to multi-channel scenarios.

plentry.pd: The list of user IDs you want to subscribe to. To subscribe to a user's audio stream, add the user's ID to this list. To remove a user from the allowlist, you need to call the method to update the user ID list; that is, you only need to include the user IDs of the users you want to subscribe to in the new list.
The number of users in the user ID list.

The list of user IDs whose audio streams you want to subscribe to. To remove a user from the allowlist, call the method to update the list; that is, only include the user IDs you want to subscribe to in the new list.
